AuthorizationFormConsent.name: AuthorizationFormConsent
AuthorizationFormConsent.description: Represents the date and way in which a user consented to an authorization form.

AuthorizationFormTextId.description: Required. The authorization form text that the Individual consented to.

ConsentCapturedDateTime.description: Required. The date and time that consent was given.

ConsentCapturedSource.description: Required. The source through which consent was captured. For example, user@example.com, www.example.com.

ConsentCapturedSourceType.description: Required. The source type through which consent was captured. For example, phone, email, or website.

ConsentGiverId.description: Required. The ID of the person consenting to the authorization form.

DocumentVersionId.description: The ID of the document version for which consent is given.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the authorization form consent.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

RelatedRecordId.description: The ID of a record showing consent of an authorization form.

Status.description: The status of the authorization form.

PartyId.description: This field was removed in API version 47.0. UseConsentGiverId instead.
